description: Practice problems from mock exams you got wrong

questions.title: Credit Migration Expected Return (Part 1)
questions.question: A bond has YTM of 1.0% and modified duration of 4.5. Using the transition matrix and expected spread changes, calculate the expected 1-year total return under credit migration.
questions.yourMistake: Only calculated expected price return, forgot to add the YTM
questions.explanation:
Expected total return = YTM + Expected Price Return

You correctly calculated the expected price return of -0.14%, but forgot to add the YTM.

- Expected price return: -0.14%
- YTM: +1.00%
- Total return: 0.86%
keyFormulas: Expected Total Return = YTM + Expected Price Return
Price Return = -Modified Duration x Change in Spread
